entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • P/Invoke string encoding doesn't work properly in some cases #69660
  • Assertion failed '!foundDiff' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #69659
  • `BackgroundService` is started before `Host` is started. #69658
  • ARM32/ARM64 gcstress-extra failures #69657
    7.0.0
  • .net 6 Blazor wasm AOT Publish is very slow #69654
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #69653
  • Update zlib (zlib-Intel) to 1.2.12 #69652
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Arm64: Perf regressions from using SIMD registers in cp/init blk #68665
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: QUIC should have an IsSupported API #65802
    7.0.0
  • Review UX from runtime nugets #50707
    7.0.0
  • R2RDump does not work anymore #69655

PullRequests

Merged

  • Clear `NO_CSE` on struct addresses in `MorphCommaBlock` #69210
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix R2RDump #69656
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Add coop GC transitions to various EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE functions; define to noop if no threads #69515
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • Fix Create/StartActivity parentId nullability #69636
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #69575
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Fix typos #69537
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT: redundant branch destructure dominating and/or #69291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm-ep] Implement EventSource counters support; add an EventPipeSessionOptions builder to TS #69567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Exposing `Radix` and the remaining `Is*` generic-math APIs #69651
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Libraryimport src gen audit #69619
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add X509AuthorityInformationAccessExtension #69629
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reenable tests for #63746. #69646
  • CI fix for native aot tests #69571
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • [mono][llvm] Enable SIMD for vectors of nint/nuint. #69647
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
